aircraft.value: Warhawk Combat - AC-9345-597 at Training Center Alpha

defect_observed.value: Structural fatigue crack at stress point. Malfunction reported by flight crew.

root_cause.value: Design limitation in component load capacity under extreme conditions

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Tail Assembly component. Physical examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.

corrective_action.value: Replace entire assembly due to extent of damage

preventive_action.value: Enhance operator training on proper usage procedures

remarks_investigation.value: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.

remarks_design.value: Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol. Date: 24/03/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality control procedures verified. Recommend periodic surveillance of manufacturing facility. Date: 27/03/2024 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Fleet experience reviewed. Similar occurrences noted on other platforms. Support fleet-wide inspection. Date: 28/03/2024 Signature: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality assurance framework assessed. Investigation process followed established protocols. Findings are valid. Date: 30/03/2024 Signature: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 30/03/2024 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta
